bug.author: simonzhaoms
bug.summary: [BUG] The link to deep dive notebook is broken in 00_quick_start/sar_movielens.ipynb
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
All the links to in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/recommenders/blob/staging/notebooks/00_quick_start/sar_movielens.ipynb>00_quick_start/sar_movielens.ipynb</denchmark-link> are broken. <denchmark-h:h3>In which platform does it happen?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the issue?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
It should be ../02_model/sar_deep_dive.ipynb. <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Good catch - can you create a PR for this?
It should be the rendering problem of nbviewer, which is fixed now.
